data.title: William Lewis
data.meta_description: This is a webpage about William Lewis, son of Thomas Michael Lewis and Maria Elizabeth Omer.
data.text:
William and Sarah Lewis

William Lewis was the second son of Thomas Michael Lewis and Maria Elizabeth Omer born on February 10, 1814, in Kentucky. (1) He married Sarah B. Hargrave, who was born on September 25, 1819 in Indiana. William and Sarah had two children: (2)

Henry Lewis was born on August 8, 1841, and died at 6 years of age on July 2, 1848.

Thomas W. Lewis (b. September 1, 1949; d. March 12, 1938).

William Lewis died in 1898.

Notes:

(1) 1880 Census Records--Lincoln, Putnam, MO, NA Film No. T9-0711; p. 508C.

(2) Family Bible of William Lewis Family.
